name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Book Translation Assistant powered by GPT

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate English text to Japanese and proofread it with GPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a Chrome Extension for book translators to support text translation and proofreading.
It has functions to translate English text into Japanese text and to convert Japanese text into a style suitable for books.
An OpenAI API key is required to use this extension.
